content: **to celebrate more than 10 wonderful years of designing and with heartfelt thanks to my many customers please enjoy this pattern as my gift to you ** *this light lacy cowl is the perfect piece for early spring with its uncomplicated lace pattern and its soothing intervals of stockinette and garter stitch this is a good project for both the beginner and experienced knitter * finished measurements 22¼ circumference x 16 high yarn 350 yds sportweight or heavy fingering weight wool or wool blend shown in crave yarn caravan 70% sw fine merino 10% camel 10% cashmere 10% mulberry silk 354 yds /100 g - nuance needles u s size 6 4mm 16 circular needle adjust needle size as needed to obtain correct gauge other stitch marker tapestry needle gauge 23 sts = 4 in stockinette skill level advanced beginner techniques include long tail cast on knitting in the round decreases and yarnovers pattern 2 page pdf with written instructions enjoy
